title: Around 250,000 Pakistanis register for Hajj 2026
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 8 (APP): With just one day remaining for the mandatory registration of Hajj 2026, as many as 250,000 Pakistanis have completed the process, official sources confirmed on Tuesday.
It is noteworthy to mention that Wednesday, July 9, is the final date for intending pilgrims to register for the upcoming Hajj pilgrimage.
According to the Ministry of Religious Affairs and Interfaith Harmony, registration can be completed through 15 designated banks across the country. Additionally, applicants also have the option to submit their applications from the comfort of their homes via the online portal.
The ministry clarified that the Hajj 2026 expenses, along with terms and conditions, will be announced separately in accordance with the official Hajj Policy.
Authorities have urged prospective pilgrims to complete their registration before the deadline to avoid any inconvenience.
